docs.snippet: Uruguay striker Luis Suarez is recovering well from knee surgery and will be able to play in its World Cup opener against Costa Rica on June 14, the national team's doctor said on Monday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay striker Luis Suarez is recovering well from knee surgery and will be able to play in its World Cup opener against Costa Rica on June 14, the national team's doctor said on Monday.

headline.main: Doctor: Suarez Will Play in Uruguay's WCup Opener
headline.print_headline: Doctor: Suarez Will Play in Uruguay's WCup Opener

docs.snippet: The biggest threat to Uruguay's new legal marijuana market has lost his party's presidential primary.
docs.lead_paragraph: The biggest threat to Uruguay's new legal marijuana market has lost his party's presidential primary.

headline.main: Anti-Marijuana Candidate Loses in Uruguay Primary
headline.print_headline: Anti-Marijuana Candidate Loses in Uruguay Primary

docs.snippet: Yasuhito Endo, Shinji Kagawa and Yoichiro Kakitani scored second-half goals Monday night to help Japan warm up for its World Cup appearance with a 3-1 victory over Costa Rica.
docs.lead_paragraph: Yasuhito Endo, Shinji Kagawa and Yoichiro Kakitani scored second-half goals Monday night to help Japan warm up for its World Cup appearance with a 3-1 victory over Costa Rica.

headline.main: Japan Scores Late to Pull Away From Costa Rica 3-1
headline.print_headline: Japan Scores Late to Pull Away From Costa Rica 3-1

docs.snippet: Three second half goals gave a confident-looking Japan a 3-1 victory over Costa Rica in a friendly ahead of the World Cup at the Raymond James stadium in Tampa, Florida on Monday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Three second half goals gave a confident-looking Japan a 3-1 victory over Costa Rica in a friendly ahead of the World Cup at the Raymond James stadium in Tampa, Florida on Monday.

headline.main: Japan Shine in Confident Win Over Costa Rica
headline.print_headline: Japan Shine in Confident Win Over Costa Rica

docs.snippet: Monaco striker Radamel Falcao was left off Colombia’s squad for the World Cup after failing to recover from a knee injury.
docs.lead_paragraph: Monaco striker Radamel Falcao was left off Colombia’s squad for the World Cup after failing to recover from a knee injury.
docs.abstract: Monaco striker Radamel Falcao is left off Colombia’s squad for the World Cup after failing to recover from a knee injury.

headline.main: Falcao Left Off Columbia’s Cup Team

docs.snippet: The goal: Reach Natal, Brazil, in time for the United States’ opening match. The route: That’s a lot less straightforward.
docs.lead_paragraph: The goal: Reach Natal, Brazil, in time for the United States’ opening match. The route: That’s a lot less straightforward.

headline.main: A Winding, Watery Way to the World Cup

docs.snippet: Maracana is filled to bursting for the World Cup final between Brazil and Argentina. If ever there's home advantage, this is it.
docs.lead_paragraph: Maracana is filled to bursting for the World Cup final between Brazil and Argentina. If ever there's home advantage, this is it.

headline.main: Sneak Preview: Brazil Tops Argentina for World Cup
headline.print_headline: Sneak Preview: Brazil Tops Argentina for World Cup

docs.snippet: France coach Didier Deschamps has included Franck Ribery in his final 23-man squad for the World Cup, even though the Bayern Munich winger is still recovering from a troublesome back injury.
docs.lead_paragraph: France coach Didier Deschamps has included Franck Ribery in his final 23-man squad for the World Cup, even though the Bayern Munich winger is still recovering from a troublesome back injury.

headline.main: Deschamps Includes Ribery in Official 23-Man Squad
headline.print_headline: Deschamps Includes Ribery in Official 23-Man Squad

docs.snippet: Giuseppe Rossi always knew he would not be in Italy's World Cup squad according to national coach Cesare Prandelli, who also revealed on Tuesday that the United States-born forward almost wasn't included in the provisional list.
docs.lead_paragraph: Giuseppe Rossi always knew he would not be in Italy's World Cup squad according to national coach Cesare Prandelli, who also revealed on Tuesday that the United States-born forward almost wasn't included in the provisional list.

headline.main: Prandelli: Rossi Knew He Wasn't in Italy WC Squad
headline.print_headline: Prandelli: Rossi Knew He Wasn't in Italy WC Squad

docs.snippet: Frank Lampard is to captain England in the World Cup warm-up against Ecuador while Wayne Rooney will be in the starting lineup again to build his match fitness, manager Roy Hodgson said on Tuesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Frank Lampard is to captain England in the World Cup warm-up against Ecuador while Wayne Rooney will be in the starting lineup again to build his match fitness, manager Roy Hodgson said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Lampard to Captain England in Ecuador Warm-Up
headline.print_headline: Lampard to Captain England in Ecuador Warm-Up
